text: It's the Happiest Place On Earth. And Kim Kardashian and family certainly looked like they were having a spectacular time while spotted at Disneyland in Anaheim, California on Tuesday. The reality diva, 37, was hard to miss, wearing a neon green jacket with slick silver bike shorts as she enjoyed a full day at the park with her closest kin. Scroll down for video What a day!
